car_catalog.title: Our Vehicle Catalog
car_catalog.description: Explore our wide selection of available vehicles.
car_catalog.no_results: No vehicles found matching your criteria.
car_catalog.no_results_compare: Add at least two cars to compare their features.
car_catalog.compare_modal_desc: Compare the specifications of selected vehicles.

search_page.title: Vehicle Search
search_page.description: Explore results from our inventory and our partners' portals.
search_page.no_results_broker: No results found on this portal for your search.
search_page.error_broker: Could not get results from this portal. Please try again later.
search_page.copart_description: Use the search bar to explore millions of vehicles directly from one of our main partners.
search_page.sum_description: Vehicles selected and verified by our team, ready for you.
search_page.loading_subtitle: We are querying the inventory in real time.
search_page.loading_warning: This may take up to a minute. Thank you for your patience.
search_page.no_query_subtitle: Enter a term in the search bar to see auction results.

copart_consultation_bar.title: Consultation List:
copart_consultation_bar.added_desc: has been added to your consultation list.

sum_consultation_bar.title: My Interests:
sum_consultation_bar.added_desc: has been added to your interest list.

sum_interest_page.title: Confirm Your Interest
sum_interest_page.description: You are about to express your interest in the following vehicles from our inventory. An advisor will contact you shortly.
sum_interest_page.next_step: Upon confirmation, your request will be sent to our team and you will be redirected to WhatsApp to contact an advisor directly.
sum_interest_page.whatsapp_message: Hello! I'm interested in the following vehicles from the SUM Trading catalog: {vehicles}. I would like more information.
